name: fastedge-as-examples
description: Basic AssemblyScript examples for FastEdge CDN applications
author: Gcore

scripts.build:body: npx cross-env NAME=body npm run build
scripts.build:geo-block: npx cross-env NAME=geoBlock npm run build
scripts.build:geo-redirect: npx cross-env NAME=geoRedirect npm run build
scripts.build:headers: npx cross-env NAME=headers npm run build
scripts.build:jwt: npx cross-env NAME=jwt npm run build
scripts.build:logTime: npx cross-env NAME=logTime npm run build
scripts.build:properties: npx cross-env NAME=properties npm run build
